task.title: Wiring Prerequisites
task.shortdesc: Prerequisites for wiring a simple single-humbucker circuit in an electric guitar.

taskbody.prereq:
You will need the following materials before starting the wiring process:
Soldering iron between 40W and 80W
Solder
Wire stripper
Electrical tape
Screwdriver set
Permanent marker
Two Split Shaft 500k potentiometers
Potentiometer knobs
They must be compatible with Split Shaft knobs.
0.022ÂµF tone capacitor
Mono output jack
Humbucker
Spool of solid core copper wire
